item.title: "Weird Al" Yankovic - Yoda
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele.
Chords used: Bb, C, D, G, A7, E7, Gm, A, F#7, Bm
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/BK5TDhyh7zk
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/w/weird-al-yankovic-w/yoda/
************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).
Want to make a donation towards this work? Visit https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ukestuff
Are you a teacher using ukulele in the classroom? Check out my video based method...effective, easy, and inexpensive! https://ukestuff.wordpress.com/the-video-ukulele-method/Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
Check out the "merch": https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Meg Donnelly - Call to the Wild
item.description:
Call to the Wild from Disney’s Zombies 2. Chords used: Am, C, F, G. For educational use.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Billie Eilish - No Time To Die - Key of Am
item.description:
Ukulele play along / Tutorial
No Time To Die - Billie Eilish From the James Bond Film
Using the chords: A Am B7 Cmaj7 Em
Suggested Strum Pattern: D D D DU or single strums You can be quite flexible with the strumming as it is slow
If you prefer, try playing some of the Am and Cmaj7 chords with your 1st finger to make it easier to move to the Em and B7 chords
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: http://www.youtube.com/c/UkuleleWales T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Maroon 5 - Memories - Baritone Ukulele - Key of C
item.description:
For Educational Use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele.
Chords used: C, G, Em, Am, F
Content warning: song may not be appropriate for school use ("'Cause the drinks bring back all the memories")
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/6wZkxxXB-io
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/m/maroon-5/memories-two/
**************************************************

item.title: ABBA - Mamma Mia
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Mamma Mia - ABBA
Using the chords: A Bm C D Em F#m G
Suggested Strum Pattern: D DU D DU You can be quite flexible with the strumming, there are a few single strums
Website: http://ukulele.wales/ Ukulele Wales Channel: http://www.youtube.com/c/UkuleleWales T-Shirts & Merch: https:https://www.redbubble.com/people/ukulaliens/shop
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: LeAnn Rimes - Raining Tacos
item.description:
It’s Raining Tacos by Parry Gripp & BooneBum. For educational use. The audio has been digitally lowered by 3 semitones to put it in an easier key for students to play on instruments. Chords Used: C, F, G, Am, Em. Chord diagrams are included for ukulele, baritone ukulele, and guitar. Original Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=npjF032TDDQ
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

A version of the song in the original key of D was requested...so here it is!
